AmazonAuthorizationManager - Class in com.amazon.identity.auth.device.authorization.api
This class is used by Login with Amazon clients to authorize users and retrieve tokens and profile data.

APIListener - Interface in com.amazon.identity.auth.device.shared
A callback interface for the AmazonAuthorizationManager API methods to return success or errors.
AUTH_ERROR_EXECEPTION - Static variable in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
The name(key) used in an Intent bundle to store an AuthError object for Activity results
AuthError - Exception in com.amazon.identity.auth.device
This class encapsulates errors from External API Methods.

AuthError.ERROR_CATEGORY - Enum in com.amazon.identity.auth.device
Each AuthError has a category to help clients determine what generic action they want to take
AuthError.ERROR_TYPE - Enum in com.amazon.identity.auth.device
Each AuthError has a type to help clients determine what detailed action they want to take
AuthorizationListener - Interface in com.amazon.identity.auth.device.authorization.api
A callback interface used by AmazonAuthorizationManager authorize API.
authorize(String[], Bundle, AuthorizationListener) - Method in class com.amazon.identity.auth.device.authorization.api.AmazonAuthorizationManager
This method handles requesting authorization (using OAuth 2.0) for a client for a specified scope.
